name: displayName
description: The name of this Contact, suitable for display to end-users.

attr_defs.name: identifier
attr_defs.description: Profile provider unique identifier

attr_defs.name: provider
attr_defs.description: Provider for this profile

attr_defs.name: remote_key
attr_defs.description: primaryKey field from Engage

attr_defs.name: accessCredentials
attr_defs.description: User's authorization credentials for this provider

attr_defs.name: friends
attr_defs.description: User's friends

attr_defs.name: following
attr_defs.description: who the user is following

attr_defs.name: followers
attr_defs.description: User's followers

attr_defs.name: displayName
attr_defs.description: The name of this Contact, suitable for display to end-users.

attr_defs.name: formatted
attr_defs.description: The full name, including all middle names, titles, and suffixes as appropriate, formatted for display

attr_defs.name: familyName
attr_defs.description: The family name of this Contact, or 'Last Name' in most Western languages

attr_defs.name: givenName
attr_defs.description: The given name of this Contact, or 'First Name' in most Western languages

attr_defs.name: middleName
attr_defs.description: The middle name(s) of this Contact

attr_defs.name: honorificPrefix
attr_defs.description: The honorific prefix(es) of this Contact, or 'Title' in most Western languages

attr_defs.name: honorificSuffix
attr_defs.description: The honorific suffix(es) of this Contact, or 'Suffix' in most Western languages

attr_defs.name: nickname
attr_defs.description: The casual way to address this Contact in real life

attr_defs.name: published
attr_defs.description: The date this Contact was first added to the user's address book or friends list.

attr_defs.name: updated
attr_defs.description: The most recent date the details of this Contact were updated.

attr_defs.name: birthday
attr_defs.description: The birthday of this contact.

attr_defs.name: anniversary
attr_defs.description: The wedding anniversary of this contact.

attr_defs.name: gender
attr_defs.description: The gender of this contact.

attr_defs.name: preferredUsername
attr_defs.description: The preferred username of this contact on sites that ask for a username.

attr_defs.name: utcOffset
attr_defs.description: The offset from UTC of this Contact's current time zone.

attr_defs.name: emails
attr_defs.description: E-mail address for this Contact.

attr_defs.name: urls
attr_defs.description: URL of a web page relating to this Contact.

attr_defs.name: phoneNumbers
attr_defs.description: Phone number for this Contact.

attr_defs.name: ims
attr_defs.description: Instant messaging address for this Contact.

attr_defs.name: photos
attr_defs.description: URL of a photo of this contact.

attr_defs.name: tags
attr_defs.description: A user-defined category or label for this contact.

attr_defs.name: relationships
attr_defs.description: A bi-directionally asserted relationship type that was established between the user and this contact by the Service Provider.

attr_defs.name: formatted
attr_defs.description: The full mailing address, formatted for display or use with a mailing label.

attr_defs.name: streetAddress
attr_defs.description: The full street address component, which may include house number, street name, PO BOX, and multi-line extended street address information.

attr_defs.name: locality
attr_defs.description: The city or locality component.

attr_defs.name: region
attr_defs.description: The state or region component.

attr_defs.name: postalCode
attr_defs.description: The zipcode or postal code component.

attr_defs.name: country
attr_defs.description: The country name component.

attr_defs.name: addresses
attr_defs.description: A physical mailing address for this Contact.

attr_defs.name: department
attr_defs.description: The department within this organization.

attr_defs.name: description
attr_defs.description: A textual description of the role this Contact played in this organization.

attr_defs.name: endDate
attr_defs.description: The date this Contact left this organization or the role specified by title within this organization.

attr_defs.name: name
attr_defs.description: The name of the organization.

attr_defs.name: startDate
attr_defs.description: The date this Contact joined this organization.

attr_defs.name: type
attr_defs.description: The type of organization, with Canonical Values 'job' and 'school'.

attr_defs.name: title
attr_defs.description: The job title or role within this organization.

attr_defs.name: organizations
attr_defs.description: Describes a current or past organizational affiliation of this contact.

attr_defs.name: domain
attr_defs.description: The top-most authoritative domain for this account.

attr_defs.name: userid
attr_defs.description: A user ID number, usually chosen automatically, and usually numeric but sometimes alphanumeric.

attr_defs.name: username
attr_defs.description: An alphanumeric user name, usually chosen by the user.

attr_defs.name: accounts
attr_defs.description: Describes an account held by this Contact, which MAY be on the Service Provider's service, or MAY be on a different service.

attr_defs.name: aboutMe
attr_defs.description: A general statement about the person.

attr_defs.name: bodyType
attr_defs.description: Person's body characteristics.

attr_defs.name: ethnicity
attr_defs.description: Person's ethnicity.

attr_defs.name: fashion
attr_defs.description: Person's thoughts on fashion.

attr_defs.name: happiestWhen
attr_defs.description: Describes when the person is happiest.

attr_defs.name: humor
attr_defs.description: Person's thoughts on humor.

attr_defs.name: note
attr_defs.description: Notes about this person, with an unspecified meaning or usage.

attr_defs.name: livingArrangement
attr_defs.description: Description of the person's living arrangement.

attr_defs.name: lookingFor
attr_defs.description: Person's statement about who or what they are looking for, or what they are interested in meeting people for.

attr_defs.name: profileUrl
attr_defs.description: Person's profile URL, specified as a string.

attr_defs.name: profileSong
attr_defs.description: URL of a person's profile song.

attr_defs.name: profileVideo
attr_defs.description: URL of a person's profile video.

attr_defs.name: relationshipStatus
attr_defs.description: Person's relationship status.

attr_defs.name: religion
attr_defs.description: Person's religion or religious views.

attr_defs.name: romance
attr_defs.description: Person's comments about romance.

attr_defs.name: scaredOf
attr_defs.description: What the person is scared of.

attr_defs.name: sexualOrientation
attr_defs.description: Person's sexual orientation.

attr_defs.name: status
attr_defs.description: Person's status, headline or shout-out.

attr_defs.name: drinker
attr_defs.description: Person's drinking status.

attr_defs.name: smoker
attr_defs.description: Person's smoking status.

attr_defs.name: books
attr_defs.description: Person's favorite books.

attr_defs.name: cars
attr_defs.description: Person's favorite cars.

attr_defs.name: children
attr_defs.description: Description of the person's children.

attr_defs.name: food
attr_defs.description: Person's favorite food.

attr_defs.name: heroes
attr_defs.description: Person's favorite heroes.

attr_defs.name: interests
attr_defs.description: Person's interests, hobbies or passions.

attr_defs.name: jobInterests
attr_defs.description: Person's favorite jobs, or job interests and skills.

attr_defs.name: languagesSpoken
attr_defs.description: List of the languages that the person speaks as ISO 639-1 codes.

attr_defs.name: movies
attr_defs.description: Person's favorite movies.

attr_defs.name: music
attr_defs.description: Person's favorite music.

attr_defs.name: pets
attr_defs.description: Description of the person's pets

attr_defs.name: politicalViews
attr_defs.description: Person's political views.

attr_defs.name: quotes
attr_defs.description: Person's favorite quotes

attr_defs.name: sports
attr_defs.description: Person's favorite sports

attr_defs.name: turnOffs
attr_defs.description: Person's turn offs.

attr_defs.name: turnOns
attr_defs.description: Person's turn ons.
